EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: REGISTRATION DEADLINE MAY 4 - Sweet Software Group Training in Houghton Lake, MI on June 5-6, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REMINDER - REGISTRATION DEADLINE: MAY 4TH
Houghton Lake, MI | June 5-6, 2012 Sweet Software Group Training in Your Area
One of the best ways to improve your knowledge and skills of your Sweet Billing Software is through hands-on group training. Regular training not only helps your billers learn how to use the software more effectively and efficiently, but often also helps your service become more profitable.
DATE: June 5-6, 2012 (2 full days of training) HOSTS: Houghton Lake Ambulance (Houghton Lake, MI) COSTS: $500
REGISTER: http://offers.tritech.com/SGTMI061_June5-6_2012_Registration.html
This course has been approved by the National Academy of Ambulance Coding (NAACâ„¢) for 11.0 continuing education units
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121 | PH: 858.799.7000
